description: You possess an impressive versatility in casting that other wizards lack.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Flexible Wizardry, Spell Mastery, wizard level 8th.

sections.text: When you use Flexible Wizardry, you can flexibly prepare a number of spell slots equal to your Intelligence modifier + 4. Furthermore, you can finalize one of these slots with a standard action instead of a full-round action.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Improved Flexible Wizardry
